itemInfo.itemDesc:
The finest milk tea that can be made. 

- Unique Effect: Combat EXP Increase +8% for 110 min
 HP Recovery +5 for 110 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Tea With Fine Scent
item.desc:
It’s made by steeping flowers or fruit in water. 

- Unique Effect: Max MP +50 for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Tea With Fine Scent
item.desc:
It’s made by steeping flowers or fruit in water. 

- Unique Effect: Max MP +50 for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Milk
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.

item.name: Cooking Honey
item.desc:
A natural resource originally obtained through Gathering that has been Processed for use as a Cooking Ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be produced by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock and then Grinding the acquired Beehive.

- Usage: Oatmeal, Tea With Fine Scent, etc.

item.name: Wheat Flour
item.desc:
A fine flour made by Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Wheat.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: Tea with Strong Scent
item.desc:
A rich-flavored tea brewed with the finest ingredients. 

- Unique Effect: MP +50 fro 75 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min
